The 64th Infantry Division (, 64-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army.
Organization
*1st Brigade
**253rd Infantry Regiment
**254th Infantry Regiment
*2nd Brigade
**255th Infantry Regiment
